Compute the hadamard product of a matrix of shape (2,3) with a matrix of shape (2,3).

For example, if we have matrices A and B:

A = [[a, b, c],
     [d, e, f]]

B = [[g, h, i],
     [j, k, l]]

The Hadamard product of A and B would be:

A ⊙ B = [[a*g, b*h, c*i],
          [d*j, e*k, f*l]]

Given that both matrices have shape (2,3), the result of the Hadamard product will also be a matrix of shape (2,3).
